queries.natural_language_query: Find players who have a batting average greater than .300, have hit more than 20 home runs, and have stolen bases more than 30 in a season.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Batting_Average > .300 AND Home_Runs > 20 AND Stolen_Bases > 30

queries.natural_language_query: Select pitchers (P) with an ERA lower than 3.00, more than 200 strikeouts pitching, and WHIP less than 1.20.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Position = 'P' AND ERA < 3.00 AND Strikeouts_Pitching > 200 AND WHIP < 1.20

queries.natural_language_query: Identify players who played more than 100 games, have an OPS (On-base Plus Slugging) higher than .900, and have less than 10 errors in a season.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Games_Played > 100 AND OPS > .900 AND Errors < 10

queries.natural_language_query: List all infielders (INF) who have more than 50 RBIs, more than 80 walks, and a batting average less than .250.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Position = 'INF' AND RBIs > 50 AND Walks > 80 AND Batting_Average < .250

queries.natural_language_query: Find designated hitters (DH) with a slugging percentage (SLG) greater than .550, more than 40 home runs, and an OBP (On-Base Percentage) less than .400.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Position = 'DH' AND SLG > .550 AND Home_Runs > 40 AND OBP < .400

queries.natural_language_query: Select outfielders (OF) who have stolen more than 40 bases, have an OPS greater than .850, and have played in at least 120 games in a season.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Position = 'OF' AND Stolen_Bases > 40 AND OPS > .850 AND Games_Played >= 120

queries.natural_language_query: Identify catchers (C) with more than 60 walks, a batting average higher than .250, and have caught more than 10 games.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Position = 'C' AND Walks > 60 AND Batting_Average > .250 AND Games_Played > 10

queries.natural_language_query: Find players who have struck out more than 150 times, with less than 20 home runs, but have an OBP higher than .350.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Strikeouts > 150 AND Home_Runs < 20 AND OBP > .350

queries.natural_language_query: List players who have more than 100 RBIs, an OPS higher than .950, and have played in less than 140 games in a season.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE RBIs > 100 AND OPS > .950 AND Games_Played < 140

queries.natural_language_query: Select pitchers (P) who have won more than 15 games, have an ERA less than 4.00, and have a WHIP less than 1.25.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Position = 'P' AND Wins > 15 AND ERA < 4.00 AND WHIP < 1.25

queries.natural_language_query: Select all players who have a SLG above .500, OBP above .400, and more than 50 walks in the 2020 season.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Year = 2020 AND SLG > .500 AND OBP > .400 AND Walks > 50

queries.natural_language_query: List players who have stolen bases greater than 20, batting average above .300, and participated in more than 80 games but have no home runs in the 2022 season.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Year = 2022 AND Stolen_Bases > 20 AND Batting_Average > .300 AND Games_Played > 80 AND Home_Runs = 0

queries.natural_language_query: Identify catchers (C) with more than 90 walks, batting average below .250, and at least 15 home runs in any season.
queries.sql_query: SELECT Name FROM expanded_detroit_tigers_baseball_stats WHERE Position = 'C' AND Walks > 90 AND Batting_Average < .250 AND Home_Runs >= 15
